core.tools package¶

Subpackages¶

core.tools.Tool module¶

class Tool¶

Bases: utils.Task.Task, abc.ABC

Class that represents a Tool in OPSE context.

In OPSE, a Tool is a process which produce a Profile from input data. The Profile could produce more information than the beginning.

append_profile(profile: classes.Profile.Profile)¶

Method that adds a profile to the tool’s profiles list.

Parameters

profile (Profile) – The profile to add.

static get_config() → dict¶

Method that returns the tool default configuration as a dictionary.

Returns

The tool’s default configuration.

Return type

dict

get_default_profile() → classes.Profile.Profile¶

Getter of the default profile.

Returns

The default profile.

Return type

Profile

classmethod get_lst_active_tools() → list[T]¶

Return the OPSE active tools list.

Returns

The list of active tools.

Return type

list[Tool]

static get_lst_input_data_types() → dict[str, bool]¶

Method that returns the list of data types that can be use to run this Tool.

The returned dictionary contains a string as key representing the data type, and a boolean as value representing if the data type is require or optional.

Returns

A dictionary containing the input data types.

Return type

dict[str, bool]

static get_lst_output_data_types() → list[str]¶

Method that returns the list of data types that can be receive by using this Tool.

Returns

_description_

Return type

list[str]

classmethod get_name() → str¶

Getter of the class name.

Returns

The name of the class.

Return type

str

get_profiles() → list[classes.Profile.Profile]¶

Method that returns the list of Profile generated by this tool.

Raises

ToolGetProfileDuringExecutionException – If the method is called during execution.

Returns

The list of generated profiles.

Return type

list[Profile]

classmethod get_tool_config() → dict[str, dict]¶

Method that returns all tools configuration as a dictionary.

Returns

A dictionary of ‘tool’:’config’.

Return type

dict[str, dict]

classmethod import_tools()¶

Method that tries to import every tools it finds in the tools directory.

It stores all available/loaded/imported tools in the class variable lst_available_tools.

classmethod is_active() → bool¶

Return whether the tool is enabled.

All tool are disabled in the default configuration.

Raises

UserWarning – If the tool is not configured.

Returns

True if the tool is enabled, else False.

Return type

bool

classmethod is_deprecated() → bool¶

Return whether the tool is deprecated.

Raises

UserWarning – If the tool is not configured.

Returns

True if the tool is deprecated, else False.

Return type

bool

launch(default_profile: classes.Profile.Profile)¶

Method that launches the current tool with a default profile.

Parameters

default_profile (Profile) – The default profile.

lst_active_tools: list = []¶
lst_available_tools: dict = {}¶
